mapper.select: select t.id, t.teacher_time_id,t.start_time,t.end_time,t2.`name`,t1.`status` from teacher_order t LEFT JOIN teacher_time t1 on t.teacher_time_id = t1.id left join teacher t2 on t2.id = t1.teacher_id where t.user_id = #{userId}

mapper.update:
update teacher_order
teacher_time_id = #{teacherTimeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_phone = #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
store_name = #{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
store_type = #{storeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ask_content = #{askContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
